rev.comment: Although it's true, it's actually not listed in the profile! The section is translated "favorite things" and the only thing listed is the ice ceam! Go figure XD
Added rest of Sonic Channel Data, and Amy is TWELVE folks
/* Trivia */ Tikal was introduced in SA while Rouge was in SA2 so Tikal is the second major female character introduced not Rouge.
Fixing up the bio... even though I don't get this "element" stuff.
Removed the "Apparently" from the bit about how she has invisibility. She really can turn invisible.

/* Theme songs */ errors in this section
/* History */ the Sonic CD wasn't her *original* design, it was an early one.
/* Game-specific abilities */ Amy Flash does not freeze the enemy, just stops them
/* Other abilities */ It was really Shadow's own memories that convinced him to help...
rv - Comment EXPLICITY states to NOT judge her weight based on her proportions, and your sentence on the VA makes no sense
Robot: Changing Category:Fictional characters with the power to move at superhuman speeds
Amy ends up in the "[[damsel in distress]]" role quite often...
It's never been confimred that she's an orphan. We just don't have any clue who her parents are.
It's never been confimred that she's an orphan. We just don't have any clue who her parents are.
It's never been confimred she's an o
Sorry for screaming :(. But just because it's belived by fans does not make it true. Now, I'm an all around SonicxAmy fan, but I've watched that episode and he does not pronounce those words.
rv - It is a widely held belief by fans, yes, enough to be noted here, but I'll slightly reword it - Also, need to scream, boy :)
Ugh, god. No, he didn't lip "I love You" in Jap. That's just fan cruft. You can't read animated characters lips because IT JUST GOES UP AND DOWN WITHOUt MOUTHING WORDS CLEARLY!
/* Voice actresses */ Removing Wikilink, apparently the link has become a redirect to this article, so it's a redirect loop.
rv, sorry to say it, but it dosen't matter if she is "even moreso than Cream the Rabbit.
/* Enemies */ Cream is supposed to be more helpless than Amy, but has been kidnapped less often... though that's probably just because Amy's been part of the series for a much longer time.
/* Enemies */ Linking to an appropriate article for the "gets into trouble" tidbit
Restored image with a more appropriate size
/* Notes and references */ Her speed is definitely far above human!
Not previously. She was Amy Rose from the start.
